Package <Unnamed>

Command-line Utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    framework
    Utility to build new 'dpsFrameworks' directories.
    generate
    Utility to make new PsAgent directory-structure.
    launcher
    Utility to launch JADE-Agents, Groups of Agents, JADE-Platform, etc.
    shell
    Utility to open JADE-Java, CLIPS, Jess or HSQL, shell-console.

Package Description

Command-line Utilities

.

Bootstrap classes used from a operating system terminal.

  1. java framework [directory-name] [options]
  2. java launcher [artifact-name] [host] [agent-name] [technology] [port]
  3. java generate [agent-name] [Typeof Node]
  4. java shell [java|jade|clips|jess|hsql]
Since:
2018-07-08, update at: 2018-07-15
Version:
1.7 (Build.1814)
Author:
Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)

The dpsFramework Agents Project

+-------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| Node    Board  Monitor  Stage       |    The dpsFramework Agents Project |
|           __             ____       |                                    |
|     __   /  \           /    \      + -----------------------------------|
|  __/  \  \__/      __  /      \                                          |
| /  \__/  /  \   __/  \ \      /                                          |
| \__/     \__/  /  \__/  \____/   dpsFramework is a standard directory on |
| /  \     /  \  \__/            file-system generated to launch groups of |
| \__/     \__/              JADE Agents which they can run Expert Systems |
|                           Applications based on CLIPS or Jess Technology.|
